|stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, connectorized,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = looks like it,, 10-pin header,, JP1,, populated |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = Linksys |defaultssid_regex = ^Linksys$ |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = RT2205D-D40 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/12/2005 |estreldate = 01/05/2005 |estprice = |upc = 745883562831 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0006ZM4XK |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Airgo AGN1223AR-03 |rad1modif = Mini PCI (long) |rad1chip1 = Airgo;AGN103BB; |rad1chip2 = Airgo;AGN100RF; |rad1chip3 = Airgo;AGN100RF; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 108 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The power adapter included with the device appears to be an AD-121ANDT. ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. The default SSID is '''Linksys''' (capital L). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=75878 On the DD-WRT forums] (high res board images)
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wrt54gx On the OpenWrt wiki] [http://bb.watch.impress.co.jp/cda/review/12219.html Review w/ internal shots (JP)] ==Pictures==
